text: The 1925 New York Giants season was the franchise's 43rd season. The team finished in second place in the National League with an 86-66 record, 8½ games behind the Pittsburgh Pirates. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font- size: 95%;" |- !
